## Description {#details}

Base class for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/genericscheduler">GenericScheduler</a>.

This class maintains information about scheduling candidates based on <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetschedmodel">TargetSchedModel</a> making it easy to implement heuristics for either preRA or postRA scheduling.

Definition at line 1076 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinescheduler-h">MachineScheduler.h</a>.
